The tissue selectivity ultrasonic osteotomy may enhance operative time reduce tissue trauma . Moreover , bony fusion rate may increase low thermal injury bone . In present study , go compare bony fusion rate cervical laminotomy either ultrasonic osteotome conventional drill .
